about.title: About Super Chair
about.subtitle: For over 15 years, we've been dedicated to creating the world's most comfortable and ergonomic office chairs. Our mission is simple: to transform your workspace into a place of comfort, productivity, and well-being.
about.our_story_p1: Super Chair was founded in 2009 with a simple observation: most office chairs were uncomfortable, poorly designed, and contributed to workplace health issues. Our founders, both ergonomic specialists, set out to change that.
about.our_story_p2: Starting in a small workshop, we began crafting chairs that prioritized human comfort and health. Today, we're proud to serve over 50,000 satisfied customers worldwide, from home offices to Fortune 500 companies.
about.our_story_p3: Every chair we create is the result of extensive research, testing, and refinement. We believe that great design should be invisible – you shouldn't notice your chair, you should just feel comfortable.
about.values_subtitle: Our core values guide everything we do, from design to customer service.
about.our_mission_desc: To revolutionize workplace comfort by creating ergonomic chairs that enhance productivity, health, and well-being for professionals worldwide.
about.our_team_desc: A passionate team of designers, engineers, and ergonomic specialists dedicated to crafting the perfect seating experience for every workspace.
about.our_quality_desc: We use only premium materials and cutting-edge manufacturing processes to ensure every chair meets our rigorous standards for comfort and durability.
about.why_choose_us_desc: We're not just another furniture company. We're ergonomic specialists who understand the science of comfort and the importance of proper posture for your health and productivity.
about.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have improved their comfort and productivity with Super Chair.

contact.faq_1_a: We offer a 30-day free return policy on all chairs. If you're not satisfied, return it for a full refund.
contact.faq_2_a: Yes, we offer professional assembly service for an additional fee. Contact us for details.
contact.faq_3_a: All our chairs come with a comprehensive 5-year warranty covering manufacturing defects.
contact.faq_4_a: Currently, we ship within the United States and Canada. International shipping coming soon.
